description: Navigate to Eloy Alfaro Y Camilo Gallegos Dominguez. Walk straight along the sidewalk, keeping the dark building on your left. Pass the small shop with the blue umbrella to reach the bus stop structure ahead. The destination is the bus stop labeled 'Eloy Alfaro - Camilo Gallegos'.
